name: Ambulance Rescue 911 Simulator
description:
Ambulance Rescue 911 Simulator is the thrilling and finest simulator of ambulance in emergency 3D game of 2016. Due to the abrupt increase in traffic on roads, it leads us towards huge problem of massive accidents. To handle this critical situation and a worthy responsible person to get through this you have been chosen as an on-duty ambulance driver! Human life is priceless, get them to the doctor as soon as possible because their lives are at stake
Get the doctor to the injured ASAP! Lives are at stake; it’s a rescue mission! Rush your ambulance around the city to get at the place of accident in time. Put on the siren of your vehicle to let the people aware about emergency regarding a rescue mission and reach the hospital as fast as you can. One more thing you need to do is to provide first aid in the state of emergency while leading your ambulance towards the hospital.

Caution: Make Sure to drive as fast as you can but first ensure your safety
Be savior in the sneak peak time of this fragile Rescue mission. Many lives are depending on you save the injured, save you’re the loved ones before it’s too late. It’s a noble duty. Be careful about the traffic and sharp cuts that may lead you vehicle towards any hazard.
We know you are curious about to know how Ambulance does on call work. Come on if you wanted to see how to be a part of rescue mission and save lives, making your way through the main road traffic with a siren indicating any emergency. Enjoy all in one in Ambulance Rescue 911 Simulator.

Putting a sharp eye on the timer will help you to score more points on Leader board and predicts you as a savior of 2016.

Features:
3D interactive more than real game play
Different camera position for realistic game play
Inside outside views of ambulance and busy roads
Ambulance equipped with latest first aid technology and ultimate realistic 3D medical equipment
Real feel of Rescue Mission with emergency environment, rush and siren
Panic sound effects of Rescue and Siren to make game play realistic
Different scenes of accidents on a different place will give you a feel as you are heading many Rescue missions at a time.
Undoubtedly addictive gameplay
New Accidents scenes and latest Ambulances will be updated periodically
Be a part of This Noble Rescue mission
And don’t Forget to let us know about you kind reviews
Have a Happy Play Time!!
